subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)

College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: Notre Dame had lost 12 consecutive games to Connecticut, including three this season, but the Fighting Irish were able to pull away in the second half to earn a spot in the title game.
snippet: Notre Dame had lost 12 consecutive games to Connecticut, including three this season, but the Fighting Irish were able to pull away in the second half to earn a spot in the title game.
